cmp: 台 (surname/(classical) you (in letters)/platform/Taiwan (abbr.), desk/platform, (measure word)/platform/stage/terrace/stand/support/desk/station/broadcasting station, typhoon)
mng: to begin, to start, then, only then

exm.mng: to begin, beginning, to start, initial
from beginning to end, all along
whole story, the ins and outs
primogenitor, founder of a school or trade
lit. the cycle comes back to the start (idiom); to move in circles, the wheel comes full circle
Qin Shihuang (259-210 BC), the first emperor
